title: What is the placement stats for MCA?
content: I have just blocked my seat in PES for MCA. I have heard the placement is good but still would like to know the numbers(approx).

comments.body: am i cooked for taking admission in PES for MCA?
Hey did you received any dates for documents verification for MCA at rr campus
are u now studying in pes ? how are the placements like bro?
